messages.author: Central Command Update
messages.body: Today is National 'Hunt a Wabbit' Day.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Critical Power Failure

Abnormal activity detected in Bunny Observatory 77's powernet. As a precautionary measure, the station's power will be shut off for an indeterminate duration.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Art Supply Storage.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Lifesign Alert

Unknown biological entities have been detected near Bunny Observatory 77, please stand-by.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to [REDACTED], a number of wire eating mammals have migrated into the [REDACTED].

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Pyroclastic anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Research Division.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Captain's Office.
